Package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks

Lock-and-key puzzle generation from MetaZelda, https://github.com/tcoxon/metazelda (BSD-licensed).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRoomLayout
    Represents the spatial layout of a lock-and-key puzzle and contains all Symbols, Rooms and Edges within the puzzle.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Condition
    Used to represent Rooms' preconditions.
    Edge
    Links two Rooms.
    Room
    Represents an individual space within the dungeon.
    RoomLayout  
    Symbol
    Represents a single key or lock within the lock-and-key puzzle.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Condition.SwitchState
    A type to represent the required state of a switch for the Condition to be satisfied.

Package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks Description

Lock-and-key puzzle generation from MetaZelda, https://github.com/tcoxon/metazelda (BSD-licensed).
